name: Jitsi

projects.summary: Improving features for moderating chats and editing messages in Jitsi.
Enhancing the functionality and user experience of the collaborative whiteboard feature.
Adding more comprehensive audio customization options for users in meetings.
Developing a Picture-in-Picture feature specifically for the iOS platform.
Implementing a JavaScript client for Jitsi Videobridge to enhance web compatibility.
Migrating the lib-jitsi-meet library to TypeScript for improved developer experience and maintainability.
Revamping the virtual backgrounds feature for better performance and more options.
Integrating various AI services with the Jitsi platform to enhance meeting experiences.
Utilizing rtcstats to gather and present statistics about meetings for analysis.
Creating an API for managing audio routing and switching dynamically during meetings.

Projects for GSoC 2025
======================

[](https://github.com/jitsi/gsoc-ideas/blob/master/2025/README.md#projects-for-gsoc-2025)

Jitsi has decided to apply for Google Summer of Code 2025!

Here's the list of project ideas for GSoC 2025! Click on the title for a more detailed description.

*   [Chat Moderation & Editing](https://github.com/jitsi/gsoc-ideas/blob/master/2025/chat-moderation-editing.md)
*   [Whiteboard Improvements](https://github.com/jitsi/gsoc-ideas/blob/master/2025/whiteboard-improvements.md)
*   [Advanced Audio Settings](https://github.com/jitsi/gsoc-ideas/blob/master/2025/advanced-audio.md)
*   [Picture-in-Picture for iOS](https://github.com/jitsi/gsoc-ideas/blob/master/2025/ios-pip.md)
*   [Jitsi Videobridge JavaScript client](https://github.com/jitsi/gsoc-ideas/blob/master/2025/jvb-js.md)
*   [lib-jitsi-meet in TypeScript](https://github.com/jitsi/gsoc-ideas/blob/master/2025/ljm-typescript.md)
*   [Virtual Backgrounds, take 2](https://github.com/jitsi/gsoc-ideas/blob/master/2025/virtual-backgrounds-ng.md)
*   [Integrated AI services with Skynet](https://github.com/jitsi/gsoc-ideas/blob/master/2025/skynet.md)
*   [Meeting stats with rtcstats](https://github.com/jitsi/gsoc-ideas/blob/master/2025/rtcstats.md)
*   [Audio Switchboard API](https://github.com/jitsi/gsoc-ideas/blob/master/2025/audio-switchboard.md)

Interested in applying for a project?
=====================================

[](https://github.com/jitsi/gsoc-ideas/blob/master/2025/README.md#interested-in-applying-for-a-project)

Make sure to read the [GSoC advice pages](https://developers.google.com/open-source/gsoc/help/student-advice/) to see how to get started, and check out the [Jitsi handbook](https://jitsi.github.io/handbook/) to get yourself more familiarized with Jitsi.

Think about preparing a draft proposal, but note that:

*   The participating organizations have not been announced yet, so we don't know whether Jitsi will participate this year.
*   Proposals or drafts shouldn't be shared publically to avoid being plagiarized. Stay tuned on details on how to share drafts with the Jitsi team privately.

Do you have a suggestion for a new project?
===========================================

[](https://github.com/jitsi/gsoc-ideas/blob/master/2025/README.md#do-you-have-a-suggestion-for-a-new-project)

If you have a suggestion for a project that's not on our list, feel free to create an issue in this repository.
